question: Which paper first showed that task-specific knowledge embedded in parameters can be extracted from one LLM using seed samples and transferred to another via parameter-efficient fine-tuning?
answer_format: Your answer should be the title of the paper WITHOUT ANY EXPLANATION.

eval_kwargs.question: Which paper first showed that task-specific knowledge embedded in parameters can be extracted from one LLM using seed samples and transferred to another via parameter-efficient fine-tuning?
eval_kwargs.reference_answer: SEEKING NEURAL NUGGETS: KNOWLEDGE TRANSFER IN LARGE LANGUAGE MODELS FROM A PARAMETRIC PERSPECTIVE
